About Tasty Boards:

This started as my own love for cheese grew, pairing and sharing with friends and family.

I love being in the kitchen creating, cooking, trying out new recipes and spices. As my children have grown and left the house I could not stop creating and making foods that people will continue to communally enjoy.

To me there is nothing better than gathering with friends/family enjoying each other's company while sharing food and drinks.

This is how Tasty Boards was born.

© Tasty Boards BC.
